about_the_game:
Wait? 4 Dimensions? I thought there were only 3? Yes, partially true. There are three dimensions that are visible in the physical world. However that doesn't stop us from experiencing higher dimensions digitally. This is what 4DSnake is all about.

Play as a snake, eat food, avoid obstacles.

This game is mainly played in a relative mode. In this mode, the camera is following you, so you are always positioned in the center of the screen.

This demo contains the first scenario in relative mode and the first scenario in absolute mode.
detailed_description:
Wait? 4 Dimensions? I thought there were only 3? Yes, partially true. There are three dimensions that are visible in the physical world. However that doesn't stop us from experiencing higher dimensions digitally. This is what 4DSnake is all about.

Play as a snake, eat food, avoid obstacles.

This game is mainly played in a relative mode. In this mode, the camera is following you, so you are always positioned in the center of the screen.

This demo contains the first scenario in relative mode and the first scenario in absolute mode.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: May also work on other versions of Linux

name: 4DSnake Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: May also work on previous versions of Windows
